attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the back of Crewe and Nantwich, Henley-on-Thames, Howden and Haltemprice and Glasgow East, it is clear that the public want change.  Mr. Brown, please heed the message and stop prolonging your government and people's misery.  Call a general election immediately and let the public decide who they want running our country!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
